# alicloud\_vpc\_ipv6\_internet\_bandwidths

This data source provides the Vpc Ipv6 Internet Bandwidths of the current Alibaba Cloud user.

-> **NOTE:** Available in v1.143.0+.

## Example Usage

Basic Usage

```typescript
import * as constructs from "constructs";
import * as cdktf from "cdktf";
/*Provider bindings are generated by running cdktf get.
See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.*/
import * as alicloud from "./.gen/providers/alicloud";
class MyConvertedCode extends cdktf.TerraformStack {
  constructor(scope: constructs.Construct, name: string) {
    super(scope, name);
    const dataAlicloudVpcIpv6InternetBandwidthsIds =
      new alicloud.dataAlicloudVpcIpv6InternetBandwidths.DataAlicloudVpcIpv6InternetBandwidths(
        this,
        "ids",
        {
          ids: ["example_id"],
        }
      );
    const dataAlicloudVpcIpv6InternetBandwidthsIpv6AddressId =
      new alicloud.dataAlicloudVpcIpv6InternetBandwidths.DataAlicloudVpcIpv6InternetBandwidths(
        this,
        "ipv6AddressId",
        {
          ipv6AddressId: "example_value",
        }
      );
    const dataAlicloudVpcIpv6InternetBandwidthsIpv6InternetBandwidthId =
      new alicloud.dataAlicloudVpcIpv6InternetBandwidths.DataAlicloudVpcIpv6InternetBandwidths(
        this,
        "ipv6InternetBandwidthId",
        {
          ipv6InternetBandwidthId: "example_value",
        }
      );
    const dataAlicloudVpcIpv6InternetBandwidthsStatus =
      new alicloud.dataAlicloudVpcIpv6InternetBandwidths.DataAlicloudVpcIpv6InternetBandwidths(
        this,
        "status",
        {
          status: "Normal",
        }
      );
    new cdktf.TerraformOutput(this, "vpc_ipv6_internet_bandwidth_id_1", {
      value: cdktf.propertyAccess(
        dataAlicloudVpcIpv6InternetBandwidthsIds.bandwidths,
        ["0", "id"]
      ),
    });
    new cdktf.TerraformOutput(this, "vpc_ipv6_internet_bandwidth_id_2", {
      value: cdktf.propertyAccess(
        dataAlicloudVpcIpv6InternetBandwidthsIpv6InternetBandwidthId.bandwidths,
        ["0", "id"]
      ),
    });
    new cdktf.TerraformOutput(this, "vpc_ipv6_internet_bandwidth_id_3", {
      value: cdktf.propertyAccess(
        dataAlicloudVpcIpv6InternetBandwidthsIpv6AddressId.bandwidths,
        ["0", "id"]
      ),
    });
    new cdktf.TerraformOutput(this, "vpc_ipv6_internet_bandwidth_id_4", {
      value: cdktf.propertyAccess(
        dataAlicloudVpcIpv6InternetBandwidthsStatus.bandwidths,
        ["0", "id"]
      ),
    });
  }
}

```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are supported:

* `ipv6InternetBandwidthId` - (Optional, ForceNew) The ID of the Ipv6 Internet Bandwidth.
* `ipv6AddressId` - (Optional, ForceNew) The ID of the IPv6 address.
* `ids` - (Optional, ForceNew, Computed)  A list of Ipv6 Internet Bandwidth IDs.
* `outputFile` - (Optional) File name where to save data source results (after running `terraform plan`).
* `status` - (Optional, ForceNew) The status of the resource. Valid values: `normal`, `financialLocked` and `securityLocked`.

## Argument Reference

The following attributes are exported in addition to the arguments listed above:

* `names` - A list of Ipv6 Internet Bandwidth names.
* `bandwidths` - A list of Vpc Ipv6 Internet Bandwidths. Each element contains the following attributes:
	* `bandwidth` - The amount of Internet bandwidth resources of the IPv6 address, Unit: `mbit/s`.
	* `id` - The ID of the Ipv6 Internet Bandwidth.
	* `internetChargeType` - The metering method of the Internet bandwidth resources of the IPv6 gateway.
	* `ipv6AddressId` - The ID of the IPv6 address.
	* `ipv6GatewayId` - The ID of the IPv6 gateway.
	* `ipv6InternetBandwidthId` - The ID of the Ipv6 Internet Bandwidth.
	* `paymentType` - The payment type of the resource.
	* `status` -  The status of the resource. Valid values: `normal`, `financialLocked` and `securityLocked`.
